questions.question: What does JSX stand for in React?
In React, what is the purpose of the virtual DOM?
Which lifecycle method is called after a component renders?
What is the purpose of React Router?
What is the purpose of the `useState` hook in React?
options: To fetch data from an API
To manage and update state in functional components
questions.correctAnswer: To manage and update state in functional components

questions.question: What is the role of the `map` function in React?
options: To create a new array with modified elements
To iterate over an array and return a new array
To filter elements in an array
To perform mathematical operations on array elements
questions.correctAnswer: To iterate over an array and return a new array

questions.question: What is the purpose of the `componentWillUnmount` lifecycle method?
options: To fetch data from an API
To perform cleanup before a component is removed from the DOM
questions.correctAnswer: To perform cleanup before a component is removed from the DOM

questions.question: What is the significance of the `key` prop in React lists?
options: It uniquely identifies elements in a list
It sets the background color of list items
It defines the font size of list items
questions.correctAnswer: It uniquely identifies elements in a list

questions.question: What is the purpose of the `useEffect` hook in React?
options: To perform side effects in functional components
questions.correctAnswer: To perform side effects in functional components

questions.question: In React, what is the purpose of the `props` object?
options: To define CSS styles for a component
